detailHtml:
POV PRO 4K Details

Capture your world in 4K Ultra HD. Lightweight, durable, hands-free—clip it, shoot, and share with Wi-Fi/Bluetooth app support.

What is the POV 4K PRO

Hands-free 4K UHD camera with AI stabilization, voice control, crystal-clear audio, ultra-wide-angle recording, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth, and iOS app.

Product Specifications

  • 3840 × 2160 @30fps; modes: 4K / 2K / FHD / Low-Light
  • 120° wide-angle lens; audio recording
  • microSD up to 256GB; includes 128GB card
  • Approx. 180 minutes recording
  • USB Type-C; ~30 min charging
  • Waterproof to 30m with protective case

What's Included?

  • POV PRO 4K action camera
  • Swivel back-clip, magnetic lanyard
  • Helmet mount, handlebar mount, mounting base
  • Frame, side stand, waterproof case
  • USB-C cable, user manual, APP access
  • 5-year warranty, 128GB SD card

Shipping & Returns

  • Orders processed in 1–2 days
  • First class shipping: 5–7 days
  • 30-day returns accepted

Warranty & Guarantee

5-year free warranty. Contact us for repairs, replacements, or solutions at no extra cost during the period.

Need Help?

24/7 customer support. Email: sales@electronixlink.com

reviews.name: Rhea T. | Ski trips
reviews.content: Clip, record, done. The waterproof case and 128GB card were all I needed for the slopes.

reviews.name: Luis M. | Night rider
reviews.content: Gyro stabilization kept city lights smooth. Charging while recording is a win.

reviews.name: Nora V. | Daily commuter
reviews.content: Magnetic clip plus lanyard makes it an everyday carry cam. Wi-Fi app backups are easy.

reviews.name: Evan K. | MTB
reviews.content: Handlebar mount is solid. 4K/30 footage looks clean for trail edits.

reviews.name: Maya L. | Travel vlogs
reviews.content: Tiny, lightweight, and the accessory pack covers every setup. Worth far more than $39.99.

reviews.name: Jules P. | Moto
reviews.content: Switched between helmet and bar mounts fast. Battery held up for a long Sunday ride.

faq.question: Q1. Does it ship with storage?
faq.answer: Yes. A 128GB card is included so you can record right away.

faq.question: Q2. Is it waterproof?
faq.answer: The included case is waterproof to 30 meters. The bare camera is splash-resistant.

faq.question: Q3. Can I record while charging?
faq.answer: Yes. Use the Type-C cable to power it while recording longer sessions.

faq.question: Q4. How do I mount it?
faq.answer: Use the magnetic clip for shirts or straps, the lanyard for neck carry, the bar mount for bikes, and the helmet mount for action shots.
